title: Imaginary Homelands - "It may be" fourth paragraph

content.question: In the sentence beginning “It may be” in the fourth paragraph, the author shifts from

choices.label: expressing conviction to revealing doubts about that conviction
reflecting on personal experience to hypothesizing about other authors
presenting a conflict to providing its resolution
describing one culture to speculating about other cultures

content.answer: reflecting on personal experience to hypothesizing about other authors

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
